title: Purple Janna Skin Sale?
body:
Purple {{champion:40}}  is currently 27% off.
She was released a LONG time ago (October).

My question is, will that skin ever become 50% off? Her being 27% off now doesn't mean I need to wait 1 year until she's 50% off, does it?

replies.body:
Star Guardian Janna, was released _relatively_ recently in terms of league.
and it's on its early sale now.

I would hazard a guess that it being on sale now does mean it likely wont be on sale again anytime in the near future. _(but I'm no expert on sales, so I could be wrong.)_

Personally I think its best to get what you can, while you can. 
its full price is roughly $10 right? 27% off makes it just over $7, thats only a difference of $2 from half price (50% off).

Even if it does have another sale in a couple of months (which i think is unlikely), is it worth not having the skin for that long just for the sake of an extra $2?


If it was me, Id take the chance, and enjoy the skin now. If there is another sale soon, then you've lost $2, _(which is like 1 small can of coke)_. And if there isn't a sale, then you've bought the skin on a 27% sale already, and have been enjoying it this whole time.

Thats my 2 cents haha

Money isn't an issue. There's just something that makes me feel good knowing I got all my skins for the cheapest amount possible. I haven't directly spent any money on my skins. All my RP comes from unused prepaid credit before it expires. XD
